name: Ball Game (itch) (Mrlegoboy)
description:
a short physics based platformer where you collect coins. can you get them all?

monkey-ball inspired game mechanics. always thought it was weird how the monkeys never tripped, so in this game you trip if you go too fast for too long.

this is my first full fledged unity game, so axpect a few unity default assets 

also theres heavy use of kevin maccleod's music
